content.body: https://w3c.github.io/browser-payment-api/specs/paymentrequest.html#user-agent-delegates-payment-request-algorithm has the statement “A user agent may not always be able to abort a request.” which could be misread as RFC 2219 language
any suggestions for language to replace it with?
or just leave it as is?
MikeSmith: yeah, a lot can be simplified now
